Instance Method# replaceNil(with:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func replaceNil<T>(with output: T) -> Publishers.Sequence<[Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output], Failure> where Elements.Element == T?
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/replaceNil(with:)#see-also)
